markdown:
Skip to main content 

###### Menu

____ Show/hide collapsed content

## 

Official Program Standards Notifications (OPSNs)

SkilledTradesBC uses Official Program Standards Notifications (OPSNs) to convey information regarding changes in the standards for training programs and information regarding training delivery to training providers. 

OPSNs should be read in conjunction with the relevant program profile for a complete set of standards for the particular program. Please consult the list below for details on OPSNs issued to date. 

OPSNs
